hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: I'm a self-taught developer from Egypt with a passion for crafting full-stack web apps.
hero.specialization: I specialize in the Full Stack Development, but I'm always game to explore new tools if they're the right fit for the job. When I'm not building, I'm probably learning something new to push my skills.
